GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v5.18.3
GSD.description:
rtla: Avoid record NULL pointer dereference

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.3 by commit b0f1c686baff74d5df10f2f46670ef4e24a75756, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 51d64c3a181938da8fb56404524e15776e9c6bf8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: rtla: Avoid record NULL pointer dereference
